short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces in Facebook the most displayed question ‘What’s on your mind today?’ with ‘What are you pretending today?’

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces in Facebook the most displayed question ‘What’s on your mind?’ with how most people answer the question: ‘What are you pretending today?’. Have fun stretching reality.
